column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jennifer - I'm sorry you and your husband did not have a pleasant dining experience at JINYA. Our seating arrangements were designed with several factors in mind: efficiency
column3: traditional Japanese decor and traditional Japanese (ramen) dining practices. JINYA Ramen Bar Houston is a franchise concept
column4: which means every last detail of our restaurant was determined in advance by the JINYA corporation
column5: which is headquartered in Los Angeles. The founder of JINYA is Japanese and has designed nearly all of the franchises in a similar fashion.
